metadata.title: USN-6402-1 -- LibTomMath vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that LibTomMath incorrectly handled certain inputs. An attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code and cause a denial of service (DoS).  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6402-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libtommath-dev - 0.42.0-1.2ubuntu0.1~esm1 libtommath0 - 0.42.0-1.2ubuntu0.1~esm1 libtommath-docs - 0.42.0-1.2ubuntu0.1~esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
